PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-01812017-03-06,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
Precisreappoints the HONOURABLE WILLIAM C. GRAHAM, P.C., C.M., Q.C., of Toronto, Ontario, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as a member of the Advisory Panel to the Minister of National Defence on Defence Policy Review, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term beginning on February 1, 2017 and ending on April 28, 2017.
AttachmentsAttachment
